name: Beware Of The Thing
description:
You have 20 seconds to win the game. Will YOU be able to do it?

If you play in browser it's highly recommended to press F11 to play in Fullscreen mode.

Don't make spoiler of the game. It's a game of luck or memorie.

This is not the greatest game of the world, this it's just a tribute to one of the best series of all time, The Addams Family (1964).

Made for the 20 second Game Jam.

Hope you enjoy,

KMKALY.
